title: Ok It's Official Now - Kolkata's Eden Gardens Will Host India's First Ever Day-Night Test Match
text:
Ok It's Official Now - Kolkata's Eden Gardens Will Host India's First Ever Day-Night Test Match

Ok It's Official Now - Kolkata's Eden Gardens Will Host India's First Ever Day-Night Test Match

BCCI president Sourav Ganguly confirmed that Bangladesh have agreed to play India in a Day-Night Test in Kolkata from November 22 to 26. It will be the 2nd Test of the series.

Cricinfo

This is the first ever Day-Night Test for India and it will mark a historic occasion. Ganguly's confirmation ended days of speculation as to whether it will be played under lights or not.

Ganguly also hopes to make it an annual affair just like the Pink Test in Australia.

Cricinfo

So we shall see Team India in action with the pink ball and it shall be another step in our cricketing history. Ganguly had this on his agenda when he took office a few days back and that target has been achieved.

Don't Miss 219 SHARES 326 SHARES 1.5 K SHARES 121 SHARES

Bangladesh are also playing 3 T20Is before the 2 Tests. That series begins on November 3.
